attributes.action: make Jezza (aka Jeremy Clarkson) Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jezza is the greatest - making him PM would be great - no more car tax, bendy buses, highly priced fuel (well, possible diesel) or stupid extra government money gaining taxes to do with anything.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
